mod.name: The Ghost of Christmas Present
mod.description: A tanky character mod by Tony Youssef

cards.name: The Big Gift
cards.description: Deal 50 damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: The Big Gift+
cards.description: Deal 70 damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Brawn
cards.description: Gain 4 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Brawn+
cards.description: Gain 6 Temporary_HP.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Advent Candle
cards.description:
Grave.
Deal 6 damage. Apply 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Advent Candle+
cards.description:
Grave.
Deal 8 damage. Apply 3 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Belch Flame
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies. Deals 4 additional damage if you have no potions.

cards.name: Belch Flame+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies. Deals 6 additional damage if you have no potions.

cards.name: Candy
cards.description: Gain 14 Temporary_HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Candy+
cards.description: Gain 18 Temporary_HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Crook Strike
cards.description:
Grave.
Deal 5 damage. Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Crook Strike+
cards.description:
Grave.
Deal 9 damage. Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Excessive Packaging
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Excessive Packaging+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Frankincense
cards.description: Gain 3 Temporary HP. Then if you have at least 60 ghostxmas:Total_HP, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Frankincense+
cards.description: Gain 5 Temporary HP. Then if you have at least 60 ghostxmas:Total_HP, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Hit Back
cards.description: The first time you take an unblocked ghostxmas:Hit before your next turn, deal 16 damage to the offending enemy.

cards.name: Hit Back+
cards.description: The first time you take an unblocked ghostxmas:Hit before your next turn, deal 21 damage to the offending enemy.

cards.name: Ho Ho Ho
cards.description: Deal 1 damage 3 times.

cards.name: Ho Ho Ho+
cards.description: Deal 1 damage 4 times.

cards.name: Hunger
cards.description: Gain 2 Temporary HP. Deal 7 damage.

cards.name: Hunger+
cards.description: Gain 3 Temporary HP. Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Jolly Jab
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage for every 10 ghostxmas:Total_HP you have.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.name: Jolly Jab+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage for every 10 ghostxmas:Total_HP you have.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.name: Jolly Tough
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Block for every 10 ghostxmas:Total_HP you have.
(Gains 0 block.)

cards.name: Jolly Tough+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Block for every 10 ghostxmas:Total_HP you have.
(Gains 0 block.)

cards.name: Knuckle Sandwich
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Knuckle Sandwich+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Deal 11 damage.

cards.name: Naughty or Nice
cards.description: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and exhaust the other. Exhaust.

cards.name: Naughty or Nice+
cards.description: Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and exhaust the other. Exhaust.

cards.name: Recover
cards.description: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Recover+
cards.description: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Room at the Inn
cards.description:
Grave.
Gain 4 Block. Gain [E].

cards.name: Room at the Inn+
cards.description:
Grave.
Gain 6 Block. Gain [E].

cards.name: Sober Strike
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. If you have negative Dexterity, gain [E] and gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Sober Strike+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. If you have negative Dexterity, gain [E] and gain 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Stomp
cards.description: Deal 7 damage. If you have negative Dexterity, deal 7 damage again.

cards.name: Stomp+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If you have negative Dexterity, deal 10 damage again.

cards.name: Unwrap
cards.description: Add a random Uncommon or Rare card into your hand. It costs 0 less this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Unwrap+
cards.description: Add a random Uncommon or Rare card into your hand. It costs 1 less this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Belly Bash
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Lose 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Belly Bash+
cards.description: Deal 13 damage. Lose 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Belly Block
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Belly Block+
cards.description: Gain 9 Block. Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Celebration
cards.description: Whenever you play a card with Grave, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Celebration+
cards.description: Whenever you play a card with Grave, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Dawn
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Draw 1 cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Dawn+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Draw 2 cards. Exhaust.

cards.name: Down the Chimney
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, gain X+ 2 temporary Strength. Exhaust.

cards.name: Down the Chimney+
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, gain X+ 3 temporary Strength. Exhaust.

cards.name: Drunken Brawl
cards.description: Deal 12 damage to a random enemy. Deals 4 additional damage if you have no potions.

cards.name: Drunken Brawl+
cards.description: Deal 15 damage to a random enemy. Deals 6 additional damage if you have no potions.

cards.name: Fury
cards.description: Deal 3 damage 4 times. Costs 1 less for each time you lost HP last turn.

cards.name: Fury+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 4 times. Costs 1 less for each time you lost HP last turn.

cards.name: Gift of Justice
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. If the enemy has 20 or less HP, set their HP to 0.

cards.name: Gift of Justice+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. If the enemy has 25 or less HP, set their HP to 0.

cards.name: Gold
cards.description: If you have at least 80 ghostxmas:Total_HP, gain 20 Gold. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gold+
cards.description: If you have at least 80 ghostxmas:Total_HP, gain 25 Gold. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gremlin Elbow
cards.description: Gain 3 temporary Strength. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 3 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Gremlin Elbow+
cards.description: Gain 4 temporary Strength. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 4 temporary Strength.

cards.name: Gremlin Eye
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E]. Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E].

cards.name: Gremlin Eye+
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E] [E]. Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Gremlin Foot
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Gremlin Foot+
cards.description: Gain 7 Block. Whenever an enemy dies, gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Gremlin Hand
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Whenever an enemy dies, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Gremlin Hand+
cards.description: Draw 3 cards. Whenever an enemy dies, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Gremlins
cards.description: Grave. Trigger your Gremlins. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gremlins+
cards.description: Grave. Trigger your Gremlins. Exhaust.

cards.name: Jolly Good
cards.description: Draw 1 card for every 20 ghostxmas:Total_HP you have. Exhaust.

cards.name: Jolly Good+
cards.description: Draw 1 card for every 20 ghostxmas:Total_HP you have. Exhaust.

cards.name: Light the Way
cards.description: Gain 2 temporary Strength. Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Light the Way+
cards.description: Gain 2 temporary Strength. Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Lumber
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Lumber+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 1 Strength.
Lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Milk and Cookies
cards.description: Gain 1 Temporary HP. Deal 1 damage. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Milk and Cookies+
cards.description: Gain 3 Temporary HP. Deal 2 damage. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Nurse
cards.description: Heal an enemy for 15 if able to gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Nurse+
cards.description: Heal an enemy for 10 if able to gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Obesity
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 4 Temporary HP and lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Obesity+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 5 Temporary HP and lose 1 Dexterity.

cards.name: Peace
cards.description: Heal an enemy for 20. Gain Block equal to the HP healed. Exhaust.

cards.name: Peace+
cards.description: Heal an enemy for 20. Gain Block equal to the HP healed.

cards.name: Philanthropunch
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Whenever you buy a card from a shop, increase this card's damage by 3 permanently.

cards.name: Philanthropunch+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage. Whenever you buy a card from a shop, increase this card's damage by 5 permanently.

cards.name: Resolutions
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Resolutions+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your discard pile.

cards.name: Russian Dance
cards.description: Deal 22 damage if the enemy intends to attack.

cards.name: Russian Dance+
cards.description: Deal 28 damage if the enemy intends to attack.

cards.name: Sack of Toys
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. At the start of your turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Sack of Toys+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. At the start of your turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Silent Night
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, gain 11 Block. If you attack that turn, lose that Block.

cards.name: Silent Night+
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, gain 15 Block. If you attack that turn, lose that Block.

cards.name: Sleigh Crash
cards.description: Deal 3 damage. Randomize, without increasing, the costs of 3 random cards in your hand this turn.

cards.name: Sleigh Crash+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Randomize, without increasing, the costs of 4 random cards in your hand this turn.

cards.name: Snowdrift
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Increase this card's Block by 3 this combat.

cards.name: Snowdrift+
cards.description: Gain 5 Block. Increase this card's Block by 5 this combat.

cards.name: Snowman
cards.description: At the start of your turn, deal 8 damage to the enemy with the least HP.

cards.name: Snowman+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, deal 12 damage to the enemy with the least HP.

cards.name: Stoutness
cards.description: If you would gain Temporary HP, gain 1 additional Temporary HP.

cards.name: Stoutness+
cards.description: If you would gain Temporary HP, gain 2 additional Temporary HP.

cards.name: Stupor
cards.description: Gain 5 Temporary HP. If you have no potions, also gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Stupor+
cards.description: Gain 7 Temporary HP. If you have no potions, also gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Swell
cards.description: Gain 4 Temporary HP X times.

cards.name: Swell+
cards.description: Gain 5 Temporary HP X times.

cards.name: Telegraphed Strike
cards.description: Grave. Deal 42 damage. Exhaust.

cards.name: Telegraphed Strike+
cards.description: Grave. Deal 42 damage.

cards.name: Uraken
cards.description: Deal 4 damage for each negative Dexterity you have.

cards.name: Uraken+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage for each negative Dexterity you have.

cards.name: Visit Every Home
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Visit Every Home+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Wrap
cards.description: Add 2 random Common cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Wrap+
cards.description: Add 2 random Common cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Advent Wreath
cards.description: Grave. Gain 4 Temporary HP. Gain 4 Block. Deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Advent Wreath+
cards.description: Grave. Gain 5 Temporary HP. Gain 5 Block. Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Anticipate
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you have a 20% chance to add The Big Gift into your hand once per combat.

cards.name: Anticipate+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you have a 20% chance to add The Big Gift into your hand once per combat.

cards.name: Baubles
cards.description: Gain 1 Orb slot. Add a Ball Lightning or Cold Snap to your hand.

cards.name: Baubles+
cards.description: Gain 1 Orb slot. Add a Ball Lightning+ or Cold Snap+ to your hand.

cards.name: Centerpiece
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable and deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Centerpiece+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable and deal 14 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Dynamo
cards.description:
Whenever you take an unblocked ghostxmas:Hit,
gain [E] [E] at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Dynamo+
cards.description:
Whenever you take an unblocked ghostxmas:Hit,
gain [E] [E] at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Eggnog
cards.description: If you have no potions, obtain a random potion. Exhaust.

cards.name: Eggnog+
cards.description: If you have no potions, obtain a random potion. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gaudete
cards.description: Grave. Return 2 cards from your discard pile to your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Gaudete+
cards.description: Grave. Return 3 cards from your discard pile to your hand. Exhaust.

cards.name: Ice Creamery
cards.description: Shuffle 2 Voids into your draw pile. Energy is now conserved between turns.

cards.name: Ice Creamery+
cards.description: Shuffle 1 Voids into your draw pile. Energy is now conserved between turns.

cards.name: Myrrh
cards.description: Gain 2 Temporary HP. Then if you have at least 100 ghostxmas:Total_HP, gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.

cards.name: Myrrh+
cards.description: Gain 4 Temporary HP. Then if you have at least 100 ghostxmas:Total_HP, gain 1 Intangible. Exhaust.

cards.name: New Year
cards.description: The next time you take an unblocked ghostxmas:Hit, Upgrade ALL of your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

cards.name: New Year+
cards.description: The next time you take an unblocked ghostxmas:Hit, Upgrade ALL of your cards for the rest of combat. Exhaust.

cards.name: Quadraticlobber
cards.description: Deal X damage to ALL enemies X times.

cards.name: Quadraticlobber+
cards.description: ghostxmas:Regift. Deal X damage to ALL enemies X times.

cards.name: Reindeer Form
cards.description: Whenever you play an Attack, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Reindeer Form+
cards.description: Whenever you play an Attack, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Sleep
cards.description:
Lose all Block.
Gain 1 Intangible.
End the turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sleep+
cards.description:
Lose all Block.
Gain 1 Intangible.
End the turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spark
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card with ghostxmas:Regift,
gain [E].

cards.name: Spark+
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card with ghostxmas:Regift,
gain [E].

cards.name: Sugarplums
cards.description: Ethereal. If an enemy intends to attack, heal 12 HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Sugarplums+
cards.description: Ethereal. If an enemy intends to attack, heal 16 HP. Exhaust.

cards.name: Surprise Gift
cards.description: Deal 30 damage. Add a random card into your deck permanently. Exhaust.

cards.name: Surprise Gift+
cards.description: Deal 45 damage. Add a random card into your deck permanently. Exhaust.

cards.name: Tis the Season
cards.description: Grave. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Tis the Season+
cards.description: Grave. At the start of your turn, draw 2 additional card.

cards.name: Year's End
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, escape this combat if able and get no rewards.

cards.name: Year's End+
cards.description: At the start of your next turn, escape this combat if able and get no rewards.

relics.name: Christmas Tree
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 1 Max HP.
